item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

So I need to edit my compiler and put my type of JDK in there, like version. I’m using 1.6.0
So where do I edit it in if the edit looks like this?:

@echo off
@TITLE Project Pk Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You Havent Downloaded Java :P…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
